params.880:
- Clue Scrolls are instead dropped as stackable Scroll Boxes.

- Creatures that drop Clue Scrolls have a 1/20 chance of dropping them. This also applies to Impling Jars.

- Clue Geodes, Clue Nests and Clue Bottles are found 10x more often.

- All Clue Scrolls have the lowest number of steps possible for their tier.
